string.text: %c[default]Bonus item:\n%c[255,238,153,26]• %c[default]Increase bullet resistance %c[255,238,15,26](%c[255,1,128,54]when installing mechanic%c[255,238,15,26])\n%c[default]Specialized protective element, which you can use to increase protection from bullet wounds. Kevlar this item allows you to reduce polipropylenowe.

Kevlar this item allows you to reduce polipropylenowe.
Replacement of metal ugleplastika allows to reduce the weight of the binoculars without losing functionality.

Modification Attiki, which is to increase the contrast. Helps to monitor when there is insufficient lighting.\n----------------------------------------\n%c[255,238,153,26]Enable/disable highlighting of binoculars, you can press "$$ACTION_NIGHT_VISION$$".%c[default]
Installation of more powerful lenses to monitor for a few long distances.
